content.question: In lines 1-2 (Quam . . . furori), we learn that a goddess

choices.label: was very perceptive about the rumor of a dreadful disease
felt that no disease, hunger, or fury could hold back her spouse
perceived that Dido was neglecting her own reputation because of passion
thought that Dido could overcome the gossip about her raging sickness

content.answer: perceived that Dido was neglecting her own reputation because of passion
